name: User Login
description: As a user, I want to log in with valid credentials and receive appropriate feedback for invalid attempts.

steps.name: I am on the Sign Up page
I enter a new unique username
I enter a valid password
I click on the Sign Up button
I should see a success message "Sign up successful."

elements.name: Sign up with an existing username

steps.name: I am on the Sign Up page
I enter an already registered username
I enter a valid password
I click on the Sign Up button
I should see an alert message "This user already exists."

elements.name: Sign up with an empty username

steps.name: I am on the Sign Up page
I leave the username field empty
I enter a valid password
I click on the Sign Up button
I should see an alert message "Please fill out the username field."

elements.name: Sign up with an empty password

steps.name: I am on the Sign Up page
I enter a new unique username
I leave the password field empty
I click on the Sign Up button
I should see an alert message "Please fill out the password field."

elements.name: Sign up with both fields empty

steps.name: I am on the Sign Up page
I leave both username and password fields empty
I click on the Sign Up button
I should see an alert message "Please fill out all required fields."

name: Sign Up Feature
description: As a new user, I want to sign up on the application with valid and invalid details.
